videoSnippet.title: Magnus Carlsen Shows Ding Liren who's Boss
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator Check out the final result https://chess24.com/en/watch/live-tournaments/champions-showdown-carlsen-ding-2017

World Champion Magnus Carlsen plays 30 games of rapid and blitz chess against Ding Liren in one of 4 matches that make up the Champions Showdown at the Saint Louis Chess Club from 9-14 November 2017. The other 3 matches feature the top American players: Nakamura vs. Topalov, Caruana vs. Grischuk and So vs. Dominguez.

The games feature no delay or increment, so we can expect time trouble mayhem. Each player has 30 minutes for the first 4 games, 20 minutes for the next 6, 10 minutes for the next 8 and finally only 5 minutes for the last 12 games. For each match the winner gets $60,000, the loser $40,000. Official website: www.uschesschamps.com

Ding Liren vs Magnus Carlsen
Champions Showdown, Round 3.2
King's Indian Attrack (A07)
11/14/2017

1. Nf3 d5 2. g3 g6 3. Bg2 Bg7 4. d4 c6 5. O-O Nf6 6. b3 O-O 7. Bb2 Bf5 8. c4 Nbd7 9. e3 Ne4 10. Nfd2 Ndf6 11. Nxe4 Bxe4 12. Bh3 Qb6 13. f3 Bxb1 14. Rxb1 e6 15. Qd3 Rfe8 16. c5 Qc7 17. e4 b6 18. e5 Nd7 19. b4 a5 20. a3 Reb8 21. Bc3 Bf8 22. Rfc1 axb4 23. axb4 bxc5 24. bxc5 Ra3 25. Bf1 Nxc5 26. dxc5 Bxc5+ 27. Kh1 d4 28. Rxb8+ Qxb8 29. Qc4 Rxc3 30. Rxc3 dxc3 31. Qxc5 Qb1 32. Kg2 c2 33. Qd6 Qd1 34. Bd3 Qd2+ 35. Kh3 Qh6+
